column5: I got out on Kemp bay yesterday with Pockets in the team pockets smokercraft. We got at least 50 perch EACH . They were biting just about anything.  I found a very small neon green grub on the smallest jig worked best. We found a couple good honey holes. They seemed to be 15' to 20' of water right near bottom. Abit of motion made the bite. To bad I have to work today. (I'd love to go back today) CX
great day on the water any size
Great stuff man.... like others.... any size to them? Leechman
friend of mine was at the flagpole in barrie.  About 25 ft of water.  You can't keep them off your line.  He said no jumbos.
Was out on the weekend also. Lots of perch but nothing real big. Jumbo's haven't come in yet. Scooter

I went out this morning for a couple hours, not quite jumbos, but,  close enough to call them keepers.  Caught half on little gold coloured Slurpee jigs and a couple on the "Bug" jig, minnows not required.
